00008 Sass_Import_List sass_importer(const char* cur_path, Sass_Importer_Entry cb, struct Sass_Compiler* comp)
00009 {
00010   void* cookie = sass_importer_get_cookie(cb);
00011   struct Sass_Import* previous = sass_compiler_get_last_import(comp);
00012   const char* prev_path = sass_import_get_path(previous);
00013   CustomImporterBridge& bridge = *(static_cast<CustomImporterBridge*>(cookie));
00014 
00015   std::vector<void*> argv;
00016   argv.push_back((void*)cur_path);
00017   argv.push_back((void*)prev_path);
00018 
00019   return bridge(argv);
00020 }
00021 
00022 union Sass_Value* sass_custom_function(const union Sass_Value* s_args, Sass_Function_Entry cb, struct Sass_Options* opts)
00023 {
00024   void* cookie = sass_function_get_cookie(cb);
00025   CustomFunctionBridge& bridge = *(static_cast<CustomFunctionBridge*>(cookie));
00026 
00027   std::vector<void*> argv;
00028   for (unsigned l = sass_list_get_length(s_args), i = 0; i < l; i++) {
00029     argv.push_back((void*)sass_list_get_value(s_args, i));
00030   }
00031 
00032   return bridge(argv);
00033 }

00035 int ExtractOptions(v8::Local<v8::Object> options, void* cptr, sass_context_wrapper* ctx_w, bool is_file, bool is_sync) {
00036   Nan::HandleScope scope;
00037 
00038   struct Sass_Context* ctx;
00039 
00040   v8::Local<v8::Value> result_ = Nan::Get(
00041     options,
00042     Nan::New("result").ToLocalChecked()
00043   ).ToLocalChecked();
00044   if (!result_->IsObject()) {
00045     Nan::ThrowTypeError("\"result\" element is not an object");
00046     return -1;
00047   }
00048 
00049   ctx_w->result.Reset(result_.As<v8::Object>());
00050 
00051   if (is_file) {
00052     ctx_w->fctx = (struct Sass_File_Context*) cptr;
00053     ctx = sass_file_context_get_context(ctx_w->fctx);
00054   }
00055   else {
00056     ctx_w->dctx = (struct Sass_Data_Context*) cptr;
00057     ctx = sass_data_context_get_context(ctx_w->dctx);
00058   }
00059 
00060   struct Sass_Options* sass_options = sass_context_get_options(ctx);
00061 
00062   ctx_w->is_sync = is_sync;
00063 
00064   if (!is_sync) {
00065     ctx_w->request.data = ctx_w;
00066 
00067     // async (callback) style
00068     v8::Local<v8::Function> success_callback = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("success").ToLocalChecked()).ToLocalChecked());
00069     v8::Local<v8::Function> error_callback = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("error").ToLocalChecked()).ToLocalChecked());
00070 
00071     ctx_w->success_callback = new Nan::Callback(success_callback);
00072     ctx_w->error_callback = new Nan::Callback(error_callback);
00073   }
00074 
00075   if (!is_file) {
00076     ctx_w->file = create_string(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("file").ToLocalChecked()));
00077     sass_option_set_input_path(sass_options, ctx_w->file);
00078   }
00079 
00080   int indent_len = Nan::To<int32_t>(
00081     Nan::Get(
00082         options,
00083         Nan::New("indentWidth").ToLocalChecked()
00084     ).ToLocalChecked()).FromJust();
00085 
00086   ctx_w->indent = (char*)malloc(indent_len + 1);
00087 
00088   strcpy(ctx_w->indent, std::string(
00089     indent_len,
00090     Nan::To<int32_t>(
00091         Nan::Get(
00092             options,
00093             Nan::New("indentType").ToLocalChecked()
00094         ).ToLocalChecked()).FromJust() == 1 ? '\t' : ' '
00095     ).c_str());
00096 
00097   ctx_w->linefeed = create_string(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("linefeed").ToLocalChecked()));
00098   ctx_w->include_path = create_string(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("includePaths").ToLocalChecked()));
00099   ctx_w->out_file = create_string(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("outFile").ToLocalChecked()));
00100   ctx_w->source_map = create_string(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("sourceMap").ToLocalChecked()));
00101   ctx_w->source_map_root = create_string(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("sourceMapRoot").ToLocalChecked()));
00102 
00103   sass_option_set_output_path(sass_options, ctx_w->out_file);
00104   sass_option_set_output_style(sass_options, (Sass_Output_Style)Nan::To<int32_t>(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("style").ToLocalChecked()).ToLocalChecked()).FromJust());
00105   sass_option_set_is_indented_syntax_src(sass_options, Nan::To<bool>(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("indentedSyntax").ToLocalChecked()).ToLocalChecked()).FromJust());
00106   sass_option_set_source_comments(sass_options, Nan::To<bool>(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("sourceComments").ToLocalChecked()).ToLocalChecked()).FromJust());
00107   sass_option_set_omit_source_map_url(sass_options, Nan::To<bool>(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("omitSourceMapUrl").ToLocalChecked()).ToLocalChecked()).FromJust());
00108   sass_option_set_source_map_embed(sass_options, Nan::To<bool>(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("sourceMapEmbed").ToLocalChecked()).ToLocalChecked()).FromJust());
00109   sass_option_set_source_map_contents(sass_options, Nan::To<bool>(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("sourceMapContents").ToLocalChecked()).ToLocalChecked()).FromJust());
00110   sass_option_set_source_map_file(sass_options, ctx_w->source_map);
00111   sass_option_set_source_map_root(sass_options, ctx_w->source_map_root);
00112   sass_option_set_include_path(sass_options, ctx_w->include_path);
00113   sass_option_set_precision(sass_options, Nan::To<int32_t>(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("precision").ToLocalChecked()).ToLocalChecked()).FromJust());
00114   sass_option_set_indent(sass_options, ctx_w->indent);
00115   sass_option_set_linefeed(sass_options, ctx_w->linefeed);
00116 
00117   v8::Local<v8::Value> importer_callback = Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("importer").ToLocalChecked()).ToLocalChecked();
00118 
00119   if (importer_callback->IsFunction()) {
00120     v8::Local<v8::Function> importer = importer_callback.As<v8::Function>();
00121 
00122     CustomImporterBridge *bridge = new CustomImporterBridge(importer, ctx_w->is_sync);
00123     ctx_w->importer_bridges.push_back(bridge);
00124 
00125     Sass_Importer_List c_importers = sass_make_importer_list(1);
00126     c_importers[0] = sass_make_importer(sass_importer, 0, bridge);
00127 
00128     sass_option_set_c_importers(sass_options, c_importers);
00129   }
00130   else if (importer_callback->IsArray()) {
00131     v8::Local<v8::Array> importers = importer_callback.As<v8::Array>();
00132     Sass_Importer_List c_importers = sass_make_importer_list(importers->Length());
00133 
00134     for (size_t i = 0; i < importers->Length(); ++i) {
00135       v8::Local<v8::Function> callback = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(Nan::Get(importers, static_cast<uint32_t>(i)).ToLocalChecked());
00136 
00137       CustomImporterBridge *bridge = new CustomImporterBridge(callback, ctx_w->is_sync);
00138       ctx_w->importer_bridges.push_back(bridge);
00139 
00140       c_importers[i] = sass_make_importer(sass_importer, importers->Length() - i - 1, bridge);
00141     }
00142 
00143     sass_option_set_c_importers(sass_options, c_importers);
00144   }
00145 
00146   v8::Local<v8::Value> custom_functions = Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("functions").ToLocalChecked()).ToLocalChecked();
00147 
00148   if (custom_functions->IsObject()) {
00149     v8::Local<v8::Object> functions = custom_functions.As<v8::Object>();
00150     v8::Local<v8::Array> signatures = Nan::GetOwnPropertyNames(functions).ToLocalChecked();
00151     unsigned num_signatures = signatures->Length();
00152     Sass_Function_List fn_list = sass_make_function_list(num_signatures);
00153 
00154     for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_signatures; i++) {
00155       v8::Local<v8::String> signature = v8::Local<v8::String>::Cast(Nan::Get(signatures, Nan::New(i)).ToLocalChecked());
00156       v8::Local<v8::Function> callback = v8::Local<v8::Function>::Cast(Nan::Get(functions, signature).ToLocalChecked());
00157 
00158       CustomFunctionBridge *bridge = new CustomFunctionBridge(callback, ctx_w->is_sync);
00159       ctx_w->function_bridges.push_back(bridge);
00160 
00161       Sass_Function_Entry fn = sass_make_function(create_string(signature), sass_custom_function, bridge);
00162       sass_function_set_list_entry(fn_list, i, fn);
00163     }
00164 
00165     sass_option_set_c_functions(sass_options, fn_list);
00166   }
00167   return 0;
00168 }
00169 
00170 void GetStats(sass_context_wrapper* ctx_w, Sass_Context* ctx) {
00171   Nan::HandleScope scope;
00172 
00173   char** included_files = sass_context_get_included_files(ctx);
00174   v8::Local<v8::Array> arr = Nan::New<v8::Array>();
00175 
00176   if (included_files) {
00177     for (int i = 0; included_files[i] != nullptr; ++i) {
00178       Nan::Set(arr, i, Nan::New<v8::String>(included_files[i]).ToLocalChecked());
00179     }
00180   }
00181 
00182   v8::Local<v8::Object> result = Nan::New(ctx_w->result);
00183   assert(result->IsObject());
00184 
00185   v8::Local<v8::Value> stats = Nan::Get(
00186     result,
00187     Nan::New("stats").ToLocalChecked()
00188   ).ToLocalChecked();
00189   if (stats->IsObject()) {
00190     Nan::Set(
00191       stats.As<v8::Object>(),
00192       Nan::New("includedFiles").ToLocalChecked(),
00193       arr
00194     );
00195   } else {
00196     Nan::ThrowTypeError("\"result.stats\" element is not an object");
00197   }
00198 }

00200 int GetResult(sass_context_wrapper* ctx_w, Sass_Context* ctx, bool is_sync = false) {
00201   Nan::HandleScope scope;
00202   v8::Local<v8::Object> result;
00203 
00204   int status = sass_context_get_error_status(ctx);
00205 
00206   result = Nan::New(ctx_w->result);
00207   assert(result->IsObject());
00208 
00209   if (status == 0) {
00210     const char* css = sass_context_get_output_string(ctx);
00211     const char* map = sass_context_get_source_map_string(ctx);
00212 
00213     Nan::Set(result, Nan::New("css").ToLocalChecked(), Nan::CopyBuffer(css, static_cast<uint32_t>(strlen(css))).ToLocalChecked());
00214 
00215     GetStats(ctx_w, ctx);
00216 
00217     if (map) {
00218       Nan::Set(result, Nan::New("map").ToLocalChecked(), Nan::CopyBuffer(map, static_cast<uint32_t>(strlen(map))).ToLocalChecked());
00219     }
00220   }
00221   else if (is_sync) {
00222     Nan::Set(result, Nan::New("error").ToLocalChecked(), Nan::New<v8::String>(sass_context_get_error_json(ctx)).ToLocalChecked());
00223   }
00224 
00225   return status;
00226 }
00227 
00228 void MakeCallback(uv_work_t* req) {
00229   Nan::HandleScope scope;
00230 
00231   Nan::TryCatch try_catch;
00232   sass_context_wrapper* ctx_w = static_cast<sass_context_wrapper*>(req->data);
00233   struct Sass_Context* ctx;
00234 
00235   if (ctx_w->dctx) {
00236     ctx = sass_data_context_get_context(ctx_w->dctx);
00237   }
00238   else {
00239     ctx = sass_file_context_get_context(ctx_w->fctx);
00240   }
00241 
00242   int status = GetResult(ctx_w, ctx);
00243 
00244   if (status == 0 && ctx_w->success_callback) {
00245     // if no error, do callback(null, result)
00246     ctx_w->success_callback->Call(0, 0);
00247   }
00248   else if (ctx_w->error_callback) {
00249     // if error, do callback(error)
00250     const char* err = sass_context_get_error_json(ctx);
00251     v8::Local<v8::Value> argv[] = {
00252       Nan::New<v8::String>(err).ToLocalChecked()
00253     };
00254     ctx_w->error_callback->Call(1, argv);
00255   }
00256   if (try_catch.HasCaught()) {
00257     Nan::FatalException(try_catch);
00258   }
00259 
00260   sass_free_context_wrapper(ctx_w);
00261 }

00263 NAN_METHOD(render) {
00264 
00265   v8::Local<v8::Object> options = Nan::To<v8::Object>(info[0]).ToLocalChecked();
00266   char* source_string = create_string(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("data").ToLocalChecked()));
00267   struct Sass_Data_Context* dctx = sass_make_data_context(source_string);
00268   sass_context_wrapper* ctx_w = sass_make_context_wrapper();
00269 
00270   if (ExtractOptions(options, dctx, ctx_w, false, false) >= 0) { 
00271 
00272     int status = uv_queue_work(uv_default_loop(), &ctx_w->request, compile_it, (uv_after_work_cb)MakeCallback);
00273 
00274     assert(status == 0);
00275   }
00276 }

00278 NAN_METHOD(render_sync) {
00279 
00280   v8::Local<v8::Object> options = Nan::To<v8::Object>(info[0]).ToLocalChecked();
00281   char* source_string = create_string(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("data").ToLocalChecked()));
00282   struct Sass_Data_Context* dctx = sass_make_data_context(source_string);
00283   struct Sass_Context* ctx = sass_data_context_get_context(dctx);
00284   sass_context_wrapper* ctx_w = sass_make_context_wrapper();
00285   int result = -1;
00286 
00287   if ((result = ExtractOptions(options, dctx, ctx_w, false, true)) >= 0) {
00288     compile_data(dctx);
00289     result = GetResult(ctx_w, ctx, true);
00290   }
00291 
00292   sass_free_context_wrapper(ctx_w);
00293   info.GetReturnValue().Set(result == 0);
00294 }

00296 NAN_METHOD(render_file) {
00297 
00298   v8::Local<v8::Object> options = Nan::To<v8::Object>(info[0]).ToLocalChecked();
00299   char* input_path = create_string(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("file").ToLocalChecked()));
00300   struct Sass_File_Context* fctx = sass_make_file_context(input_path);
00301   sass_context_wrapper* ctx_w = sass_make_context_wrapper();
00302 
00303   if (ExtractOptions(options, fctx, ctx_w, true, false) >= 0) {
00304 
00305     int status = uv_queue_work(uv_default_loop(), &ctx_w->request, compile_it, (uv_after_work_cb)MakeCallback);
00306     assert(status == 0);
00307   }
00308 }

00310 NAN_METHOD(render_file_sync) {
00311 
00312   v8::Local<v8::Object> options = Nan::To<v8::Object>(info[0]).ToLocalChecked();
00313   char* input_path = create_string(Nan::Get(options, Nan::New("file").ToLocalChecked()));
00314   struct Sass_File_Context* fctx = sass_make_file_context(input_path);
00315   struct Sass_Context* ctx = sass_file_context_get_context(fctx);
00316   sass_context_wrapper* ctx_w = sass_make_context_wrapper();
00317   int result = -1;
00318 
00319   if ((result = ExtractOptions(options, fctx, ctx_w, true, true)) >= 0) {
00320     compile_file(fctx);
00321     result = GetResult(ctx_w, ctx, true);
00322   };
00323 
00324   free(input_path);
00325   sass_free_context_wrapper(ctx_w);
00326 
00327   info.GetReturnValue().Set(result == 0);
00328 }

00330 NAN_METHOD(libsass_version) {
00331   info.GetReturnValue().Set(Nan::New<v8::String>(libsass_version()).ToLocalChecked());

00334 NAN_MODULE_INIT(RegisterModule) {
00335   Nan::SetMethod(target, "render", render);
00336   Nan::SetMethod(target, "renderSync", render_sync);
00337   Nan::SetMethod(target, "renderFile", render_file);
00338   Nan::SetMethod(target, "renderFileSync", render_file_sync);
00339   Nan::SetMethod(target, "libsassVersion", libsass_version);
00340   SassTypes::Factory::initExports(target);
00341 }
